4. Finally, since the claim states that "the greatest number of drops from 1 player happen over the span of only 1 year", and we found that this is not the case, the claim is FALSE.

]

claim: all of the player have already finish their span of play on the united state national rugby union team
resp:
Here are the steps for my reasoning process:

1. Identify the column in the table that contains the end date (span) of each player's career. This will help me determine if any players are still active.
2. Scan through the rows to find out if there are any players whose end date is not specified as "-". A player with an end date of "-" indicates they are still active on the team.
3. If all the players have an end date, then it means that they have all finished their span of play on the United States National Rugby Union team.
